title: crash/freeze laptop
body:
Not so long ago I did a reset of my laptop. The problem was that my laptop crashed/froze everytime my game was about to start. So i can login and start the game (untill the loadingscreen before the game accually starts) but when i spawn my laptop just crashes. I can't do anything after that. I can't tab out or crtl alt del or whatever. And I also get the tzzzz( the same sound when you get the blue screen when you crash) sound during the crash. After ther reset I'm still having the same problems. I'm ok with laptops but I can't say I'm great with them. I tried everything I can think off and the internet isn't really giving me an answer. I also reinstalled league to be sure and didn't help. Since I only play league, I have no idea if I'm having the same problems with those. I really need some help with this. 
I'm playing league for 2 years now on the EU(W) server.

And sorry for my English, I know that it ain't great :)

specs (srry that it's in my language): 
Microsoft Windows 10 Home
Versie	10.0.14393 Build 14393
Andere beschrijving van besturingssysteem	Niet beschikbaar
Leverancier van besturingssysteem	Microsoft Corporation
Systeemnaam	DESKTOP-53CBN0F
Systeemfabrikant 	ASUSTeK COMPUTER INC.
Systeemmodel	X751LAB
Systeemtype	Op x64-gebaseerde PC

Processor	Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-5200U CPU @ 2.20GHz, 2197 MHz, 2 core('s), 4 logische processor(s)
BIOS-versie/datum	American Megatrends Inc. X751LAB.507, 7/12/2015
SMBIOS-versie	2.8

BIOS-modus	UEFI

Model BaseBoard	Niet beschikbaar
Naam BaseBoard	Basiskaart
Platformfunctie	Mobiel
Status beveiligd opstarten	Ingeschakeld
PCR7-configuratie	Uitbreiding van bevoegdheden vereist om te kunnen weergeven
Map met Windows	C:\WINDOWS
Systeemmap	C:\WINDOWS\system32
Opstartapparaat	\Device\HarddiskVolume1
Landinstelling	België
HAL (Hardware Abstraction Layer)	Versie = "10.0.14393.206"
Gebruikersnaam	DESKTOP-53CBN0F\the grumpies
Tijdzone	Romance (standaardtijd)
Geïnstalleerd fysiek geheugen (RAM)	8,00 GB
Totaal fysiek geheugen	7,87 GB
Beschikbaar fysiek geheugen	2,24 GB
Totaal virtueel geheugen	9,75 GB
Beschikbaar virtueel geheugen	3,74 GB
Ruimte voor wisselbestand	1,88 GB
Wisselbestand	C:\pagefile.sys
Hyper-V - Modusextensies VM-monitor	Ja
Hyper-V - Extensies voor adresomzetting op tweede niveau	Ja

Hyper-V - Bescherming tegen gegevensuitvoering	Ja

Thanks in advance, hope you can help me out.

replies.body: Yeah, I've seen this issue quite a bit recently for players with Windows 10.  A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing and fps problems.  Disabling that should fix your specific issue.  Hope that helps!
And thx for the fast reply!
oh damn, it worked. Thx dude you really helped me out there :o
